name: Scout-Tank
description:
Information

Very difficult side scrolling shooter. Made for Game Boy Jam 7.

Play as a small radio-controlled tank that sent against a huge number of strong enemies! Your tank can be of different types in different missions. Enemies can also be different. Good luck!

Controls

The control system tries to be like Game Boy buttons:

Menu

Up & Down arrow keys to select a mission

Press Z to confirm selection

Game

Arrow keys to move, Z to shoot, Enter to exit to menu.
